title: Vayathu Vaa Vaa Solgirathu Song Lyrics Thulluvadho Ilamai
stanzas: <div>Vayathu Vaa Vaa Solgirathu Song Lyrics Thulluvadho Ilamai

Vayathu vaa vaa solgirathu
iniyum thadai enna kaetkirathu
unakkum enakkum mathiyile
oru madhil suvarthaan
indru ezhugirathu (2)

kadhal nilave kadhal nilave
velicham vendaam poividu
kangal moodu kanavil naanum
avalai cherum kaalam idhu

Vayathu vaa vaa solgirathu
iniyum thadai enna kaetkirathu
unakkum enakkum mathiyile
oru madhil suvarthaan
indru ezhugirathu

thalai mudhal kaal varai
nee oru ragasiyam
ah ah vayadhuku vanthapin
ovvondrum adhisayam

oru poo vaasame unmel
idhunala mattume kanden
adhu pen vaasamaai vaara
adhai nana swaasamaai konden

Vayathu vaa vaa solgirathu
iniyum thadai enna kaetkirathu
unakkum enakkum mathiyile
oru madhil suvarthaan
indru ezhugirathu

panithuli serkiren
en viral nuniyile
un idhazhgalil ootrinen

un neruvazhamum kooda
adi saathaaranam netru
un kaal kendaiyin venmai
adhil thee moottuthe indru

Vayathu vaa vaa solgirathu
iniyum thadai enna kaetkirathu
unakkum enakkum mathiyile
oru madhil suvarthaan
indru ezhugirathu

kadhal nilave kadhal nilave
velicham vendaam poividu
kangal moodu kanavil naanum
avalai cherum kaalam idhu

Vayathu vaa vaa solgirathu
iniyum thadai enna kaetkirathu
unakkum enakkum mathiyile
oru madhil suvarthaan
indru ezhugirathu
